creator: loisel.jerome@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

We have a script which is working fine in JMeter 2.13 but fails hard (with server complaining about some cookies missing) in JMeter 3.0 RC2.

We cannot provide the JMX due to confidentiality, but we can setup a meeting to show the issue. Please check any development made related to cookies.

Let me know what I can do to help solving this issue.

creator: support@ubikloadpack.com
text:
Hello,
What is the used CookiePolicy and Cookie Handler ?

The new standard to use is:
- HC4CookieHandler
- standard

Thanks

creator: loisel.jerome@gmail.com
text: I used HC4CookieHandler (we know HC3 is discontinued), tried with "default" and "compatibility" but not "standard". It's working fine with standard setting. Thanks Ubik!
